data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 12,435 believers in the state of Gambela Peoples.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Gambela Peoples, Ethiopia
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, help 13 new simple churches start among the 69,200 people in the state of Gambela Peoples, Ethiopia. One within reach of everyone living here.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 12,435 believers find a person of peace today among the 56,765 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Gambela Peoples, Ethiopia. Please, stir the 12,435 believers here to pray for awakening.
Lord, remember the Suri, Kacipo-Balesi people. Make the Suri, Kacipo-Balesi people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Gambela Peoples, Ethiopia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Gambela Peoples, Ethiopia.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Gambela Peoples to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."
